summary: In a Norwegian city with a 24-hour daylight cycle a Swedish murder investigator has been brought in on a special case. Sleep deprived, he makes a horrible mistake which is discovered by the killer he has been hunting.
cast: Maria Mathiesen|Stellan Skarsgård|Sverre Anker Ousdal|Gisken Armand|Kristian Figenschow|Thor Michael Aamodt|Frode Rasmussen|Bjørn Moan|Maria Bonnevie|Marianne O. Ulrichsen|Bjørn Floberg|Guri Johnson
title: Insomnia
